review: I was wanting this for a while, finally got it. When it works, it's terrific and gets daily use, but it is often very buggy. Apps will crash, Netflix and Prime TV will freeze at a 25% buffer, some apps won't load at all. I have to often unplug the thing and plug it back in for it to work. I kind-of get tired of having to do that 2-3 times to get through one movie.UPDATE: Lowered the star rating, as issues and bugs are getting worse. Netflix streams terribly on this, stopping to buffer every 15-20 seconds. This thing spends more time buffering than streaming anything. Not reccomended.
author: CodyD

review: I loved the Fire Stick when I first received it because it was so easy to use. Now, after 5 months, it disconnects itself from WiFi almost continually. I can no longer watch any shows. Occasionally, it will stay connected for a few minutes, but then it disconnects again. I really expect a product like this to last longer.
